references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High Definition Video Generation with Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-definition video generation model using diffusion models, which is a significant advancement in the field and directly relevant to the current work.

references.paper_title: FIFO-Diffusion: Generating Infinite Videos from Text without Training
references.reason: This paper proposes the FIFO-Diffusion method, which is a key baseline and starting point for the proposed Ouroboros-Diffusion in the current paper.

references.paper_title: FreeNoise: Tuning-Free Longer Video Diffusion via Noise Rescheduling
references.reason: This is a key comparative method that is very close to the proposed method in this paper, making it important for comparison and analysis.

references.paper_title: VideoCrafter1: Open Diffusion Models for High-Quality Video Generation
references.reason: This paper provides a high-quality backbone text-to-video model used in the current work, making it a foundational element.

references.paper_title: VBench: Comprehensive Benchmark Suite for Video Generative Models
references.reason: This paper introduces the benchmark dataset used for evaluating the models in this paper, making it crucial for the experimental results.
